name: ts-nameof-monorepo
description: Monorepo for ts-nameof. This file is only used for scripts.

scripts.lint-packages: cd packages/babel-plugin-ts-nameof && yarn run lint && cd ../ts-nameof && yarn run lint && cd ../ts-nameof.macro && yarn run lint && cd ../../
scripts.lint-shared: cd shared/common && yarn run lint && cd ../tests-common && yarn run lint && cd ../transforms-babel && yarn run lint && cd ../transforms-common && yarn run lint && cd ../transforms-ts && yarn run lint && cd ../../
scripts.lint: yarn run lint-packages && yarn run lint-shared
scripts.install: cd packages/babel-plugin-ts-nameof && yarn install && cd ../ts-nameof && yarn install &&  cd ../ts-nameof.macro && yarn install &&cd ../../
scripts.test-packages: cd packages/ts-nameof && yarn run test && cd ../ts-nameof.macro && yarn run test && cd ../../
scripts.test-shared: cd shared/transforms-babel && yarn run test && cd ../transforms-common && yarn run test && cd ../transforms-ts && yarn run test && cd ../../
scripts.test: yarn run test-packages && yarn run test-shared
scripts.create-declaration-file: cd packages/ts-nameof && yarn run create-declaration-file && cd ../ts-nameof.macro && yarn run create-declaration-file && cd ../../
scripts.verify-declaration-file: cd packages/ts-nameof && yarn run verify-declaration-file && cd ../../
scripts.verify: yarn run lint && yarn run test && yarn run verify-declaration-file

author: David Sherret
